analyzed: dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /

original: sha chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: sha chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa /

original: dgra'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dgra'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang nges par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //

original: ske tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ske tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: ske tshe la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la /

analyzed: de bzhin du tsher ma can gyi me la sbyin sreg @148a * // bya ste / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de /

analyzed: gsod pa'i las 'di dag thams cad kyang / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi gsungs pa yin no //
translated: are taught for those who possess the stage of generation, in order to ward off those who do harm to the Three Jewels.

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i gsod pa'i las kyang /

original: ling ga ste sems khros pas /
analyzed: ling ga ste sems khros pas /

translated: and recite the mantra of Sumbha-nidhana, with the words of incitement, ‚ÄúLet so-and-so be carried off by the rakshasas!‚Äù and he will be carried off by the rakshasas.

original: rus phye zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rus phye zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
